page.title: Li-Cor NetWinder Global Edition IR2 Controller

revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Li-Cor |model=NetWinder |revision=Saga (4200-507U) |manuf_country=Canada |is_manuf=No |manuf=Corel |manuf_model=NetWinder |est_release_date=10/2000 |type=video server |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.7 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel StrongARM |cpu1_model=SA-110 |cpu1_cspeed=233 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F008S3-120 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Centon |ram1_model=CCRL64M/PRPS0 |ram2=2 |ram2_brand=Hyundai |ram2_model=HY514264B-JC-50 |ram2_num=4 |expansion_if_types=IDE |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (19200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=i21143;i21143-PD; |eth_chip2_brand=ICS |eth_chip2_model=ICS1890 |eth_chip3_brand=Winbond |eth_chip3_model=W89C940F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=10M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I/O Controller;Winbond;W83977AF;;1;,,, High Performance CPLD;Xilinx;XC9536;;1;,,, Video Input Processor;Philips;SAA711WP;;1;,,, 32KB CMOS Static RAM;Winbond;W24257AJ;;1;,,, 1KB Microwire Serial EEPROM;Microchip;93LC46;;1;,,, Audio System Controller and Codec;Rockwell;RWA010;;1;,,, PCI Bus Master IDE Controller w/ PCI Arbiter;Winbond;W83C553F;;1;,,, Multimedia Graphics Controller & Digital TV Encoder;IGS Tech;CyberPro2010;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Driver/Receiver;Analog Devices;ADM211;;1;,,, PCI Bridge Controller;Digital Equipment;21285-AA;;1;,,, Low Voltage Audio Power Amplifier;TI;LM286;;1; |flags=VGA, RTC w/ battery }} {{TagLine|Li-Cor NetWinder Global Edition IR2 Controller - DNA Analyzer Gene Reader}} :Components Included: *Li-Cor NetWinder Global Edition IR2 DNA Sequencer - Model 4200-02G *[https://www.ebay.com/itm/Li-Cor-IR2-NetWinder-Global-Edition-Controller-for-DNA-Analyzer-Gene-Reader/234102834927 Li-Cor NetWinder Global Edition IR2 Controller] - ''NetWinder'' Saga 4200-507U
